snippet.title: Sonic 3D Director's Cut Official Release! - Steam Workshop
snippet.description:
I've finished work on the Sonic 3D Director's Cut. The final version is now available on Steam Workshop, and as a downloadable patch file if you already own the original Genesis/MegaDrive game

Steam Workshop: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1241378226

Downloadable Patch:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/3ca06h519l2kh71/SONICDX.xdelta?dl=0

(You'll need to use "DeltaPatcher" to apply the patch to your ROM)

Music: Movin' by MK2
